ai-patthana8.61:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.61:1.1_0: Thoughts don’t give rise to thoughts. ...
ai-patthana8.61:2.1_0: Thoughts don’t give rise to thought: ‘There are the three conditions for the arising of thought.’
ai-patthana8.61:3.1_0: And they don’t give rise to thoughts about thoughts. ...
